Magic Notes:
Circle Forms: Can Wild Shape into a CR 1 creature
Eldritch Invocations: 2 selections
Abjure Enemy: R60' Can use Channel Divinity to halt a target (DC 12 Wisdom inflicts half speed) for 1 min
Arcane Recovery: Can recover 1 spell slot levels (level 6 maximum) during a short rest once per long rest
Armor Of Shadows: Can cast Mage Armor on self at will
Combat Wild Shape: While using Wild Shape, can spend a spell slot and use a bonus action to regain 1d8 hit points per slot level
Divine Sense: R60' Can discern the location of celestials, fiends, and undead for 1 rd 3 times per long rest
Elemental Adept (Thunder): Spells that inflict thunder damage ignore resistance and treat 1s as 2s on damage dice
Fey Presence: Can inflict a choice of charmed or frightened (DC 12 Wisdom negates) for 1 rd on all creatures in a 10' cube once per short rest
Font Of Magic: Can use 2 Sorcery Points per long rest/Can use a bonus action to convert between Sorcery Points and spell slots
Illusion Savant: Can copy illusion spells into spellbook for half cost
Improved Minor Illusion: Knows the Minor Illusion cantrip; effects can include both a sound and an image
Lay On Hands: Can heal 20 hit points per long rest and can use 5 hit points' worth to cure disease or poison
Pact Magic: Can cast spells from the warlock spell list
Song Of Rest: Friendly listeners regain +1d6 hit points from spending Hit Dice after a short rest
Spellcasting: Can cast spells from the wizard spell list and cast spells marked with [R] using a ritual
Thief Of Five Fates: Can use a warlock spell slot to cast Bane once per long rest
Wild Magic Surge: Casting a spell has a 5% chance of unleashing a random magic effect
Wild Shape: Can transform into a CR 1 (land only) creature for 1 hr 2 times per short rest
